Text:
Apologies if you downloaded the first version.
I fixed an incorrect index name.
If you downloaded the first version just use the second index for the pre-activated one, or re-download.

I tested the hell out of the release, but it was a last minute name change that I screwed up. I apologize.

Hi Murphy78, thanks a lot for all your hard work, a lot of us appreciate and treasure your releases.

However, just confirming with this one, once installed, it will activate by itself, correct? And also it will keep checking if activation is needed by itself automatically, do we need to set anything in the task scheduler ourself or will it be automatically configured?
TIA
Only if you use the KMS-Activated index. I left the other one in there for people who like to use a different method to activate their kms.
KMS-Activated index, what's that? I'm still downloading but just want to clarify before hand, thanks.

It's the index that is KMS-Activated.
The other one is not activated.
Hey murphy, i am a fan of your uploads. Can you upload a separate torrent for MS office 2013 with the latest final build?
If you just want office, check out the proplus vl that arkenstone has upped. it's the best one for being able to activate.
Thanks Murphy78 this is just fantastic what more can we want. This is some fine work and lot's of hours you must have put in this .. Work great it was fast download also Thanks again...
Excellent, works perfectly, less work for us. Thanks bud!! I'm off to d/l your x64 version of this. Just out of curiosity, what antivirus would you recommend to use with this? Which one do you use?
Hi Murphy78. I would like to install Windows 8 Pro x86 and office 2013. Should i downoad this or go for  your latest individual uploads? Thanks.
